home.title: Cincinnati
home.blurb: Following 4 years in NYC, 1 in Dayton, OH, and now I am in Cincinnati. I wish I were closer to hiking areas but maybe that'll be for the next move…

book.title: The Anomaly
book.blurb: A friend recommended this award-winning book, an after my Secret Santa at work got it for me, I've been reading it little after little. So far, pretty happy with how it's going!

game.title: GTA: Vice City
game.blurb: I saw sale after sale on the GTA Trilogy, and desppite many reports of it being pretty broken, nostalgia got the best of me. I beat GTA3 and I am now onto reliving the '80s in Vice City. Definitely a defining game for me and my love of retro aesthetics!

show.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
show.blurb: I stopped in the middle of season 6 some time in 2018, and I've elected to finally watch the rest of it. A couple of episodes here and there is a perfect non-rhythm for me to enjoy!
